name: goolink

”Alexa, turn on power”

Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Enrich goolink compatible devices with voice comand. To tell goolink devices turn on siren and turn on/off outlet.
